questions.title: Horoscopes accurately predict future events 85% of the time

David Bowie thinks he is being stalked by someone who is dressed like a giant pink rabbit.
During a nine month strike in 2002, the Weather Channel broadcast reruns.

Owls are the only birds who can see the color blue.
Every time you lick a stamp, you're consuming 1/10 of a calorie.
Prior to the discovery of Penicillin in 1928, laughter really was the best medicine.
65% of Elvis impersonators are of Asian descent
The youngest pope was 11 years old.
Jimmy Carter once reported a UFO in Georgia.
